item.title: Inotiv Inc S-1
item.description: Inotiv Inc, which is in the Services-Commercial Physical & Biological Research [8731] industry, SEC S-1 filing on December 23, 2021 had 15556 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: shares - 418 instances common - 244 instances may - 170 instances securities - 158 instances offering - 154 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
